description:
Discover the ecommerce world of Prestashop. Learn how you can buy and sell products and services on the world-wide-web and make money.

This is a step-by-step tutorial on setting up a functional, working Prestashop ecommerce web site without purchasing anything.

You will learn how to change the Front End side of Prestashop. That part where your customers and visitors land and are viewing each time they come to your web site.

You will learn how to change images, slider and data on the front end of Prestashop. I will show you how to change social media links to your store. You will know how to change and edit your store information and location with GPS for customers and visitors.

You will also learn how to use Microsoft Excel and have it do some of the heavy lifting for creating acceptable CSV files for upload to your Prestashop store.

You will learn how to customize the social media accounts to work for your online business. I will also show how to create loyalty codes for customers and potential customers.

Finally when you and I are done, you will have a fully customized working ecommerce web site guaranteed.
title: Successfully MASTER Prestashop Ecommerce Software
